confirmation.heading: Are you sure you want to edit the following decision data?
confirmation.caption: Editing decision data
confirmation.bodyUnpublish:
Editing this dataset will unpublish any existing decision data for this profession. Are you sure you want to do this?
There will be no data available on this profession until the new draft is published.
confirmation.bodyUnsubmit:
Editing this dataset will unsubmit any existing decision data for this profession. Are you sure you want to do this?
There will be no data available on this profession until the new draft is published.
